embed:
On William Karlsson: Rumour is he's on the trade block. Elliotte talks about separating fact from friction and that he got push back from teams on this. Says he hasn't spoken to Vegas directly. Maybe Vegas is talking to team Elliotte hasn't talked to but he doesn't have… pic.twitter.com/SMOaHxrLmp

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 10, 2025

On Montreal: Elliotte says they are in on Nic Hague but he's also heard they want to upgrade on forward. #GoHabsGo #NHL #StanleyCup pic.twitter.com/FnAANz3gw0

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 10, 2025

On Seattle: Calls them lowkey about them being a team to do something and says they are eager to take a step this year. Might go after an offer sheet as they have cap flexibility. #seakraken #NHL #StanleyCup pic.twitter.com/V8gxYHrGiD

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 10, 2025

On Utah: They are expected to be active this offseason. He says, "I heard that the Mammoth are discussing some stuff and some stuff that might not necessarily be considered small." He says the pressure is on and they are in the middle of a lot of things. #TusksUp #UtahHC #NHL… pic.twitter.com/mgrdoSGHLs

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 10, 2025

32 Thoughts Podcast: Elliotte explains that what he believes on JJ Peterka is that it's not that Buffalo won't trade him it's that they don't want to trade him. He has mentioned previously this is agent driven. #Sabrehood #NHL #StanleyCup pic.twitter.com/5Ncin7eFtJ

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 10, 2025

Toronto, Carolina, and Vegas almost had a three-way deal in place that would've sent Mitch Marner to Vegas and Mikko Rantanen to Toronto, per @mirtle.

The deal reportedly fell through because Carolina and Vegas "failed to find the right assets" to complete it. pic.twitter.com/dBrFLOl9mP

— B/R Open Ice (@BR_OpenIce) June 9, 2025

I just finished reading @CraigCustance’s book “The Franchise: The Business of Building Winning Teams”. The chapters on Julian Brisebois and Tom Dundon were my favourite. Reading about how those two think was really interesting.

— NHL Trade Alert (@NHLTradeAlert) June 8, 2025

title: Rangers Trade Talk Heating Up
embed:
Heard around the NHL combine this week:

— #NYR among a handful of teams (BUF, UTA, SEA) looking to shake up their roster soon
— Shesterkin, Fox and Panarin may be only #NYR untouchables in trade talk
— Keep an eye on Vladislav Gavrikov and #NYR if Chris Drury can free up space

— Arthur Staple (@StapeAthletic) June 7, 2025
